com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic.pnml

Class PetriMarkup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic.pnml.PetriMarkup

  • public final class PetriMarkup
extends java.lang.Object
    Transform a PetriNet object into EPNML 1.1 and back. This markup is XML-based. The following is a basic example.

    <pnml>
    <net type="http://www.yasper.org/specs/epnml-1.1" id="net1">
    <transition id="transition1">
    <graphics>
    <position x="78" y="78"/>
    <dimension x="24" y="24"/>
    </graphics>
    </transition>
    <place id="place1">
    <graphics>
    <position x="78" y="12"/>
    <dimension x="20" y="20"/>
    </graphics>
    <initialMarking>
    <text>1</text>
    </initialMarking>
    </place>
    <place id="place2">
    <graphics>
    <position x="144" y="78"/>
    <dimension x="20" y="20"/>
    </graphics>
    </place>
    <arc id="arc1" source="place1" target="transition1"/>
    <arc id="arc2" source="transition1" target="place2"/>
    </net>
    See Also:
    http://www.petriweb.org/specs/epnml-1.1/pnmldef.pdf, http://www.petriweb.org/specs/simple.pnml
